exceptions.tactic: induction s as [| h t IHs].
exceptions.exn: The reference s was not found in the current environment.

original: intro Hsorted. intro Hi_size. induction s as [| h t IHs]. -- simpl in Hi_size. lia. -- destruct t as [| h1 t1]. ++ simpl. lia. ++ intros x0. simpl in Hsorted. destruct Hsorted as [H1 Hsorted]. simpl. generalize (sorted_nth Rle (h :: h1 :: t1) Hsorted). intro H. specialize (H i). destruct i. ** apply Rle_refl. ** intro Hi_t1. apply (H (lt_pred (S i) (S (S (size t1)))) x0). lia.
